replacements.const DEFAULT_TAGLINE = \"All your chats: const DEFAULT_TAGLINE = "所有聊天，一个 OpenClaw 搞定。"
replacements.\"Your terminal just grew claws—type som: "你的终端长出了爪子——输入命令，让机器人帮你搞定繁琐工作。"
replacements.\"Welcome to the command line: where dre: "欢迎来到命令行：梦想在这里编译，信心在这里崩溃。"
replacements.\"Gateway online—please keep hands, feet: "网关已上线——请将手脚和附肢始终保持在 Shell 内。"
replacements.\"I speak fluent bash, mild sarcasm, and: "我精通 bash、轻度讽刺和激进的 Tab 补全能量。"
replacements.\"Automation with claws: minimal fuss, m: "带爪子的自动化：最少麻烦，最大效果。"
replacements.\"If you're lost, run doctor; if you're: "迷路就跑 doctor；勇敢就跑 prod；聪明就跑 tests。"
replacements.\"The only bot that stays out of your tr: "唯一不会进入你训练集的机器人。"
replacements.\"Because the right answer is usually a: "因为正确答案通常是一个脚本。"
replacements.\"Your messages, your servers, your cont: "你的消息，你的服务器，你做主。"
